settings.disabled-update-checker: Disabling the update checker is not recommended.
settings.disabled-hardware-acceleration: Disabling hardware acceleration is not recommended as hardware acceleration almost always improves performance.
settings.restart-for-device-change: You may have to restart the application for microphone or camera changes to apply.
settings.background-throttling-disabled: Allowing hidden windows to remain active will result in higher CPU usage and lower battery life.
unload.message: Are you sure you want to quit?
unload.detail: Any unsaved changes will be lost.
updater.detail: This update may contain new features or bug fixes.
updater.ignore: Don't remind me again for this update
updater.security.message: An important security update is available: v{version}
updater.security.detail: This version of TurboWarp may be vulnerable to an exploit that puts your computer at risk of infection. Updating is highly recommended.
crash.title: Crashed
permission.audio-denied-description: The app will not be able to record sounds or detect loudness.
permission.video-denied-description: The app will not be able to take photos or use video sensing.
permission.macos-instructions: To change permissions, open System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Privacy > Camera or Microphone.
packager-moved.title: Please use the File > Package project menu instead
packager-moved.details: This button still works for now, but it may be removed in a future update.
rosetta.title: Running under Rosetta is not recommended. Use the Apple Silicon version instead.
rosetta.details: The Apple Silicon version will perform better and use less battery. Please install the Apple Silicon version instead.
